expectations.name: valid_orderkey
expectations.expression: orderkey IS NOT NULL AND orderkey > 0

expectations.name: valid_partkey
expectations.expression: partkey IS NOT NULL AND partkey > 0

expectations.name: valid_suppkey
expectations.expression: suppkey IS NOT NULL AND suppkey > 0

expectations.name: valid_linenumber
expectations.expression: linenumber IS NOT NULL AND linenumber > 0

expectations.name: valid_quantity
expectations.expression: quantity IS NOT NULL AND quantity > 0

expectations.name: valid_extendedprice
expectations.expression: extendedprice IS NOT NULL AND extendedprice > 0

expectations.name: valid_discount
expectations.expression: discount IS NOT NULL AND discount > 0

expectations.name: valid_tax
expectations.expression: tax IS NOT NULL AND tax > 0

expectations.name: valid_linestatus
expectations.expression: linestatus IS NOT NULL AND linestatus IN ('F', 'O')

expectations.name: valid_shipdate
expectations.expression: (shipdate IS NOT NULL AND shipdate >= '1900-01-01') or shipdate is null

expectations.name: valid_commitdate
expectations.expression: commitdate IS NOT NULL AND commitdate > 0

expectations.name: valid_receiptdate
expectations.expression: (receiptdate IS NOT NULL AND receiptdate >= '1900-01-01') or receiptdate is null

expectations.name: valid_shipmode
expectations.expression: shipmode IS NOT NULL AND shipmode IN ('RAIL','REG AIR','TRUCK','MAIL','SHIP','FOB')
